__e: Come on. Let's go. Take... take me away from here, as far away from here as humanly possible.
"I've said yes, now take me along darling."
Let's go, then. I don't care where, just take me away from here.
Take me to your mothers room.
Take me the open-top bus tour now, or I will crap on your stupid face!
Take me home father, I want to go home.
T ake me to your father, dear
Take me home father, I want to go home.
Take me to my friend, or I will leave you here to die.
We'll go to some quiet place as far away as possible.
Bring me to the market since it's not dark yet
Well, next time take me to a movie, not to a bar where I get so trashed I take a guy home that I don't even know.
I no longer want to be here, take me away with you.
Take me with you, and I promise, I'll never leave you again.
And if you do, please, take me with you.
I no longer want to be here, take me away with you.
Take me with you, and I promise, I'll never leave you again.
And if you do, please, take me with you.
After dragging me all over the place, at least take me somewhere safe!
Just point me in the direction of a party and a pretty girl and I'll show you how good I feel.
Will you please take me to a ballad bar today. Please!
Take me out there right now.
I know the palace is hidden in this village, so take me there.
